DOC.brief_summary: This study assess antimyeloma effect BHQ880A patient smolder multiple myeloma high risk progression active multiple myeloma . BHQ880 administer every 28 day previously untreated patient . Disease assessment perform monthly effect bone metabolism assess measurement serum urine bone biomarkers , change BMD , QCT FEA . Additionally , PK profile BHQ880 single agent follow multiple dos obtain .
DOC.brief_title: Study BHQ880 Patients With High Risk Smoldering Multiple Myeloma
DOC.criteria: 1 . Confirmed diagnosis SMM highrisk progression multiple myeloma 1 . BMPC ≥ 10 % serum Mprotein level ≥ 3 g/dL , OR 2 . BMPC ≥ 10 % , serum Mprotein level < 3 g/dL , abnormal free light chain ratio < 0.125 > 8.0 2 . No previous current antimyeloma therapy 3 . Patients ≥ 18 year age 4 . Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) Performance status 0 1 1 . Previous treatment IV bisphosphonates ( i.e. , pamidronate zoledronic acid 2 . Another primary malignant disease require systemic treatment 3 . Concomitant Paget 's disease bone , uncorrected hyperparathyroidism , uncontrolled thyroid disease 4 . Clinically significant uncontrolled heart disease ( e.g. , unstable angina , congestive heart failure , uncontrolled hypertension , ventricular atrial arrhythmia ) 5 . Treatment investigational product within 28 day first dose study treatment 6 . Pregnant nursing ( lactate ) woman 7 . Women childbearing potential , UNLESS use two birth control method . The two method double barrier method barrier method plus hormonal method . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
